mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS LISTCOUNT FROM OVERDUE O JOIN BORROW B ON B.BORROW_NO = O.BORROW_NO JOIN BOOK_STATUS S ON S.STATUS_NO = O.STATUS_NO JOIN BOOK_LIST L ON L.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT NO , ADMIN_NO , TITLE , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , DEL_YN , HIT FROM NOTICE WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT NO ,ADMIN_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,DEL_YN ,HIT FROM NOTICE WHERE NO = #{no} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NO DESC
